meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Aristolochia, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The snakeroot grew tall in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Herbalists often use snakeroot in their remedies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid snakeroot in the rabbit's burrow.
meanings.sent4: The snakeroot wound its way through the soil like a silent serpent.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of snakeroot filled the room, calming everyone.

meanings.definition: Any of various plants of the genus Eupatorium, also used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: We planted snakeroot near the other herbs.
meanings.sent2: The snakeroot leaves had a distinct shape.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit nibbled on the snakeroot, thinking it was a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: The snakeroot stood out among the other plants like a guardian.
meanings.sent5: The snakeroot's purple flowers added a pop of color to the garden.
